scripts.predev: node -e "const net = require('net'); const server = net.createServer(); server.once('error', err => { if (err.code === 'EADDRINUSE') { console.error('\x1b[31mError: Port 3000 is already in use. Please stop the other process first.\x1b[0m'); process.exit(1); }}); server.once('listening', () => server.close()); server.listen(3000);"
